title: Enforce
description: There’s two sides to every story...And ours? Isn't pretty...Then again, what's pretty about the mafia? Trace Rooks, that’s what. But she only wants one of us, and I'll kill him before I let him have her. The only problem? We're cousins. And she may just be our long lost enemy. Whoever said college was hard, clearly didn't attend Eagle Elite University. Welcome to hell also known as the Mafia where blood is thicker than life, and to keep yours? Well, keep your friends close, and your enemies?Even closer...
author: Rachel Van Dyken
